resources.string:
Welcome to Workout! This is your first time viewing this workout and you will hear the First Play Station in this order: 
 1.Side To Side (Phantoms Remix) - Ariana Grande 
 2.Wish You Hell - Like a Storm
 3.Wonderwall - Ryan Adams

Welcome to Workout! This is your first time viewing this workout and you will hear the First Play Station in this order: 
 1.Still Falling for you - Ellie Goulding
 2.We Found Love - Rihanna
 3.Wild Things - Alessia Cara
Welcome back to Workout. You\'ve viewed this activity before. On this subsequent play, you will hear music shuffled from the designated Radio Station.

1. The first time you play any Activity above, you will hear the First Play Station in order. \n \n2. On the subsequent play of the same Activity, you will hear music shuffled from the designated Radio Station.
